<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Embrace the Pain](/Feats.aspx?ID=5855) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 82 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger**
A creature within your reach damages you with a melee attack.

</column>

---

Ignoring your pain, you reach out and grab the creature or weapon that caused you harm. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) the triggering creature or to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383) the creature of the weapon it damaged you with.
name: Embrace the Pain
